DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety, tolerability, immunogenicity and the way the body absorbs, distributes, breaks down and excretes various increasing single and multiple subcutaneous doses of PA401 in healthy subjects. This study will also look at the effect of PA401 on inflammation in the lungs following an inhaled lipopolysaccharide (LPS) challenge (LPS is a bacterial cell wall fragment) and sputum induction (a procedure performed to help to cough up sputum (phlegm)) after a single subcutaneous dose of two dose levels.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1, First in Human Study to Investigate the Safety and Tolerability of PA401
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult males aged 18 to 65 years Subjects with a clinically relevant medical history
